Available versions

  • ver. 5.4


IPMI Supermicro X9DRT

Overview

IPMI Supermicro X9DRT

Measuring all available values by IPMI.

All are triggered.

Plus some graphs.

Author

Daniel Pogac

Macros used

There are no macros links in this template.

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

There are no discovery rules in this template.
